label.title: API token to define in the settings of the App
URL of the freshbooks account to define in the settings of the App

helpText.title: help text for providing the freshbooks account URL in the settings
helpText.value: The API URL for your FreshBooks account. It should end in /api/2.1/xml-in.

description.title: Description of the App
description.value: Easily track time spent on tickets with FreshBooks

see_topic.title: Error message inviting the user to visit a forum article

submitting.title: Wait text after clicking on the submit button

loading.title: loading text after clicking on the submit button

signed_in_as_message.title: Signed in confirmation message, this will say the name of an agent for example signed in as Bob

empty.title: This will declare that a field has not been completed. It will output the field name, for example priority is empty!

hours.title: This is a label for a number input field to contain a number of hours for instance 17 hours

note_text.title: This is the ticket number, this text is set by default in the note box

notes.title: This is a notes fields label

select_project.title: This is a project dropdown this is the title of that dropdown

select_task.title: This is the content of the dropdown it is a type of project

success.title: success message when the user enters a number of hours and clicks submit

problem.title: problem message, the placeholder here will contain the error message from freshbooks, could be something like, there's been a problem: the user already exists

not_found.title: Error message displayed in the App when there are no projects created yet on the freshbook account side
not_found.value: No projects found for your FreshBooks account

none.title: Error message displayed in the App when there are no users created yet on the freshbook account side

not_found.title: Error message displayed in the App when there are no users created yet on the freshbook account side
not_found.value: No users found for your FreshBooks account!

not_selected.title: message when no user has been selected in the app

select.title: message prompting the user to start selecting a user in the app
